snippet.title: PowerBeatsVR Gameplay Trailer (Full Release)
snippet.description:
PowerBeatsVR is a high-intensity VR fitness game (https://www.powerbeatsvr.com), where you box, dodge, and squat to the rhythm of energetic music. You have professionally designed workouts with leaderboards, an auto-generator for your own music, playlists for longer sessions, an integrated editor, multiple weapons, fitness statistics,  as well as calorie tracking and support for heart rate monitors. Suitable for all types of players and fitness levels!

Get it now on 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/810500/PowerBeatsVR/
Oculus: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2154327277955973/
Viveport: https://www.viveport.com/apps/90b80d5b-2375-4cbd-9e8f-07d2f362d551/PowerBeatsVR/
—

PowerBeatsVR is an action-packed, rhythm-based VR fitness game that trains your entire body like no other.

Move with the beat as you punch, duck, and dodge your way through challenging obstacle courses in several virtual arenas. Shatter incoming boulders into pieces and see those calories burn with ease.

The more you move and the stronger you hit, the higher your score. Have fun while training your stamina, strength, and reflexes. And while doing that, you can watch your heart rate with our built-in support for heart rate monitors and make sure to stay in your optimal range.

Experience intense VR workouts on higher levels of difficulty. Or choose the easier modes, and just enjoy smashing stuff to the beat of a diverse and energetic soundtrack. In any case, there is a leaderboard waiting for you!

Want to use your own music? Just do it. Design workouts for your custom songs with the editor or let the game auto-generate everything the way you like it.
—

► You can follow us online here:
Website: https://www.powerbeatsvr.com
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/powerbeatsvr
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/powerbeatsvr
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Powerbeatsvr/

► And subscribe to this YouTube channel for further videos: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAwU9c-kLeSv9FdP_Uc4HDg?sub_confirmation=1

Thanks and have fun!
